siteMetadata.title: BioDynaMO Website
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about biology simulations.

markdownRemark.html: In contrast to most neural network simulators, BioDynaMo allows to model the growth of neurons, i.e. the arborizations. Importantly, these take into account interactions of neurons as well as physical processes. More information on this aspect will follow shortly
